Description.0: The ship features a round saucer that has tapered hull blok at the rear.
Description.1: These ships secondry hull is mounted in much the same way as all her sister classes.
Description.2: The ship has a varing nacelle count, mounted at a 45deg angle at the rear of the secondry hull when using the FTL systems the nacelles combine, normaly they are parallel to each other but seperated by about 12m.
Description.3: These two combustion rockets are mounted below the saucer where the two hull sections meet.
